body:
1. Put a Darksteel Plate on a creature
2. Cast an umbra spell with "totem armor" on it
3. Use a spell or ability to destroy the creature

I would expect the enchantment to survive, but no, it's gone. Even though the creature itself survives. It's indestructible thanks to Darksteel Plate.

Magarena 1.26, Debian Linux (Wheezy)
author: [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/)
title: (bug?) Darksteel Plate + Umbra, umbra destroyed when creature "destroyed"
